Thecode, if you don't start paying more attention and making sence of your 
posts, diciplinary action will be taken. If you would have been paying 
attention, Zardus ordered the alliance base's computer to take in any extra 
info from his wrist comp only. All the terminals are off-line. Also, the 
comps wouldn't take commands from someone they see as an enemy, and Dracona 
falls under that category.
